successes.title: The New Garden Tower - Powering a Fresh Food Revolution
successes.description: Grow 50 plants in just 4 square feet -- from almost anywhere. Fueled by vermi-composting, Garden Tower 2 is a revolution in fresh food!

Pledges.description: Every $5 pledge goes entirely to our "Give a School a Garden" fund.  At the end of the campaign we will announce the school(s) that are recipients of your generous support.

Give a school a Garden!
We have requests every week to sponsor teachers & garden programs k-12 with Garden Towers.  Not sure which school/teacher/program to support? -- We have a long list!  Over 40 schools are already teaching with the Garden Tower.

Exclusive local-supporter special:
ONE GARDEN TOWER 2 and FREE POTTING SOIL for local pickup in Bloomington, Indiana!  Made entirely in the USA; fully recyclable, and food-grade.

Exclusive early-supporter special:
ONE GARDEN TOWER 2 -- be one of the first to get the all-new Garden Tower.  Includes free 50-state shipping.  Going fast!
ONE GARDEN TOWER 2 shipped to your door this January (or sooner) for spring! Free 50-state shipping.  Made entirely in the USA; fully recyclable, and food-grade.
ONE GARDEN TOWER 2 shipped to your door this February (or sooner) for spring! Free 50-state shipping.  Made entirely in the USA; fully recyclable, and food-grade.
TWO GARDEN TOWER 2s shipped to your door this January (or sooner) for spring! Free 50-state shipping.  Made entirely in the USA; fully recyclable, and food-grade.
TWO GARDEN TOWER 2s shipped to your door this February (or sooner) for spring! Free 50-state shipping.  Made entirely in the USA; fully recyclable, and food-grade.
THREE GARDEN TOWER 2s shipped to your door this January (or sooner) for spring! Free 50-state shipping.  Made entirely in the USA; fully recyclable, and food-grade.
THREE GARDEN TOWER 2s shipped to your door this February (or sooner) for spring! Free 50-state shipping.  Made entirely in the USA; fully recyclable, and food-grade.

Friends & Family Farm Pack:
Get a tall pallet of EIGHT GARDEN TOWER 2s anywhere in the USA (freight included).  This is a below-wholesale one-time offer to outfit your community with the best Garden Towers ever made!

Apocalypse Pack:
Get a tall pallet of EIGHT GARDEN TOWER 2s anywhere in the USA (freight included) and 25 PACKETS of organic, non-GMO SEEDS for spring veggies and tender greens from an independent & local source. This is a below-wholesale one-time offer to outfit your silo's growroom (greenhouse) with the best Garden Towers ever made!

Below-zero-profit COMMUNITY GARDEN INSTALLATION:
We will donate our time to organize with leaders in your community to construct a vertical gardening space using Garden Towers provided below our cost.  Have a vision?  Share it with us.  We will do everything we can to make it a reality.
